----------------------------------------------------------------------
# **Request for Supply of Six Row Plot Seeder**

## **Request Reference**
WS4051377071-Doc4162579994

## **Publication Details**

*   Published: [August 24, 2023](#2023-08-24)
*   Closing Date and Time: [September 08, 2023 2:00:00 PM (EDT)](#2023-09-08T14:00:00)
*   Amendment: Amendment 2, dated [August 29, 2023](#2023-08-29)
*   Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

## **Supply Requirements**

The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada seeks to procure one (1) six row plot seeder with adjustable row spacing. The product/system/equipment must be equivalent to the Wintersteiger DM-1300 Plot Row Motion seeder. The key requirements are:

*   3-point frame for a category 2, 3-point hitch
*   Total machine width of 2.2 meters
*   Planting singular row plots up to 6 rows via the Wintersteiger magazine system and singer funnel or pre-distributor
*   Distance measurement via wheel sensor with automatic correction of the measuring wheel via GPS

## **Trade Agreements**

This bidding opportunity is open to suppliers subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## **Contracting Entity and End User**

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
*   End User: Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC), K.W. Neatby Bldg, 960 Carling Ave, Ottawa, ON K1Y 4X2, Canada

## **Contact Information**

To express interest and obtain more information, please contact Prabhjot Sran at:

prabhjot.sran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
